name: Free Software Projects by Pruet
body:
# Active Projects
* [Thai Fulltext Search Plugin for MySQL/MariaDB](https://pruet.github.io/thaift_parser/)
* [UTF-8 Thai Sorting for MariaDB](https://github.com/MariaDB/server/commit/fb35b9ad) 

# Inactive Projects
* [Ebook formater](e.g., Sony PRS-505](http://project-ile.net/lulu/ebook/) for formatting A4/letter size PDF file to make it fit to 6" screen of Ebook reader  (2009)
* [LoliTwitter](http://project-ile.net/lulu/lolitwitter/) Twitter client for Thai people. If your mobile can read Thai natively, I suggest you to use JibJib instead. (2008)
* [MindRhythm](http://project-ile.net/lulu/mindrhythm.html) J2ME tool for meditation (2004).
* jMRMLJava class(bean) with JSP suite for interfacing with MRML compliant CBIR(Content-Based Information Retrieval) Server, such as [GnuIFT](http://www.gnu.org/software/gift/) (Note: unfortunately, the source code of this project is lost, I will try my best to find it and post it back). (2001-2002)
* [LekLekDict](http://project-ile.net/lulu/leklekdict/) - Mobile Dictionary for J2ME MIDP1.0/2.0. (~2003 - 2013)
* MP3Station Online Music Community with playlist, messaging, and basic chat support. You can download the PHP source code of this project from [here](http://project-ile.net/lulu/mp3station.zip), but please be warned that it was written years ago, you might need to change the code to make it fit the current version of PHP. Please see the INSTALL/README files inside for more detail. (1999-2003)
* [Thai sorting support](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-server/blob/5.7/strings/ctype-tis620.c) for MySQL (with TIS-620 encoding). (1999)

#License

Most softwares are under GPL (GNU Public License). Please read the license (in [Thai](http://th.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%93%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B9) or [English](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html)) before downloading and using it. Thanks in advance.

#Support

I'm not providing a personal or direct support, please use public channels such as github for requesting help.

# Donation

if you want to support my work, first please read [this article](http://project-ile.net/lulu/donation.html) (in Thai). Second, read the software license in [Thai](http://developer.thai.net/gpl/) or [English](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html) . In short, your donation is not meant that I have to support the usage of my software in anyway, my softwares is provided "as is" or "no warranty" . However, I'll provide some support in a public channel (web board, mailing list, etc.). Please not email me directly asking about the support, thanks in advance. Moreover, you can still use these software in any way you like (according and under the GPL) without the donation, just donate if you happy to do so.

Then, if you're agreed, please choose the way to donate

Via my [Paypal account](http://sourceforge.net/donate/index.php?group_id=98985) using Paypal or Credit card
Via my back account - Siam Commercial Bank , account number 667-2 03314-2 CMU sub-branch, account name Pruet Boonma . Please email me after transferring.
Contact

# Primary contact

Pruet Boonma (pruetboonma AT gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
